item.title: 图片报》称大众汽车首席执行官预见到中国报复性关税的威胁
item.description: 据《图片报》（Bild am Sonntag）报道，大众汽车公司首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）在为中国政府可能采取的报复行动做准备时，希望能找到一种替代方案来解决对中国电动汽车征收关税的问题。【原文：Volkswagen AG Chief Executive Officer Oliver Blume hopes for an alternative solution to tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles as he braces for potential retaliation from Beijing, Bild am Sonntag reported.】

item.title: S&P公司的8万亿美元涨势将面临棘手财报季的考验
item.description: 在股市经历了今年的火爆开局之后，交易员们正面临着一系列风险，从经济担忧到利率不确定性，再到选举焦虑。但本周，股票能否继续上涨的最重要变量或许又将成为焦点：企业盈利。【原文：Traders are staring down a series of risks after the stock market’s torrid start to the year, from economic fear, to interest rate uncertainty, to election angst. But perhaps the most important variable for whether equities can keep rolling returns to the spotlight this week: corporate earnings.】

item.title: 苹果逐渐放弃年度产品发布策略
item.description: 苹果公司正在逐步放弃每年一次的产品升级周期，此举可能会使产品发布更加频繁，减少令人不安的延迟。另外：苹果公司下一代产品的发布时间，包括 Apple Intelligence。【原文：Apple is inching away from its annual product upgrade cycle, a move that could lead to more frequent releases and fewer jarring delays. Also: A look at when the company’s next products are coming out, including Apple Intelligence.】

item.title: 飓风海伦过后，佛罗里达州面临致命热带威胁
item.description: 热带风暴 "米尔顿 "有可能演变成一场大飓风，袭击包括坦帕在内的佛罗里达州墨西哥湾沿岸地区，可能造成数十亿美元的损失，给这个不到两周前还在遭受 "海伦 "袭击的州和地区带来更多苦难。【原文：Tropical Storm Milton is threatening to grow into a major hurricane aimed at Florida’s Gulf Coast including Tampa, potentially causing billions of dollars in damage and heaping more misery on a state and region still reeling from Helene less than two weeks ago.】

item.title: 以色列在 10 月 7 日里程碑之前加强加沙和黎巴嫩行动
item.description: 在哈马斯于 10 月 7 日发动致命袭击一周年纪念日的前一天，以色列正陷入一场没有明确结局的多线战争，它向加沙北部派兵，并在黎巴嫩保持密集的空袭和有限的地面机动。【原文：A day before it marks a year since the deadly Oct. 7 attacks by Hamas, Israel is locked into a multi-front war with no clear end, sending troops back to northern Gaza and keeping up intense aerial attacks and a limited ground maneuver in Lebanon.】

item.title: 中国股市怀疑论愈演愈烈，傲视全球的势头仍在延续
item.description: 中国股市振奋世界的涨势未能说服许多全球基金经理和策略师。【原文：The world-beating rally in Chinese stocks is failing to convince many global fund managers and strategists.】

item.title: 竞选接近尾声，石油大亨成为特朗普的重要现金来源
item.description: 石油高管已成为唐纳德-特朗普越来越重要的资金来源，因为行业巨头们纷纷打开钱包，支持这位共和党提名人竞选连任白宫总统。【原文：Oil executives have emerged as an increasingly important source of funding for Donald Trump, as industry titans open their wallets to bolster the Republican nominee’s campaign for a second term in the White House.】

item.title: 纽约太阳报》所有者接近以 5.5 亿英镑收购《每日电讯报》：金融时报
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，《纽约太阳报》的所有者即将以超过 5.5 亿英镑（7.22 亿美元）的价格收购英国《每日电讯报》。【原文：The owner of the New York Sun is close to acquiring the UK’s Telegraph newspaper for more than £550 million ($722 million), according to the Financial Times.】

item.title: SZ称德国预计今年经济将萎缩0.2
item.description: 据《南德意志报》报道，德国政府预计今年德国经济将萎缩 0.2%。【原文：The German government expects the nation’s economy to shrink by 0.2% this year, Sueddeutsche Zeitung reported ahead of an official estimate due on Wednesday, without saying how it got the information.】

item.title: 大坝即将泄洪，泰国政府发布洪水警报
item.description: 泰国政府已向包括曼谷在内的 11 个中部省份发出洪水预警，因为位于湄南河沿岸的一座大型水坝准备泄洪。【原文：Thailand’s government has issued a flood warning to 11 central provinces, including Bangkok, as a major dam located along the Chao Phraya River prepares to release water.】

item.title: 香港最大开发商一天内以折扣价售出 204 套公寓
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商新鸿基地产有限公司（Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd.）为促进销售，以折扣价出售公寓单位，一天之内就售出了 200 多套公寓。【原文：Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd., Hong Kong’s biggest property developer, sold more than 200 apartments in one day after it offered the units at a discount to boost sales.】

item.title: 地区冲突加深，沙特股市风险上升
item.description: 由于地区紧张局势加剧，沙特股市在经历了夏季反弹后摇摇欲坠，利雅得股市经历了多年来最糟糕的第四季度开局。【原文：The Saudi stock market is wobbling after a summer rally, with the Riyadh bourse enduring its worst fourth-quarter start in years as regional tensions soar.】

item.title: 新西兰在经济衰退中加快 149 个项目的审批速度
item.description: 新西兰政府将在一项快速审批法案中纳入 149 个项目，主要涉及住房、基础设施、资源和农业等领域，以重振放缓的经济。【原文：New Zealand’s government will include 149 projects in a fast-track approvals bill — predominantly in housing, infrastructure, resources and agriculture — in a bid to revive a slowing economy.】

item.title: 英国吸引谷歌和布鲁克菲尔德参加峰会，竞相投资
item.description: 在工党政府努力刺激外来投资之际，英国公布了一系列将在峰会上发表演讲的科技大亨、私募股权领袖和银行老板。【原文：The UK has unveiled a raft of tech tycoons, private equity leaders and bank bosses who will speak at a summit as the Labour government bids to spur inward investment.】

item.title: 美国通胀将为以劳动力市场为重点的美联储提供保证
item.description: 美国的通货膨胀在第三季度末可能有所放缓，这让正在将政策重点更多地转向保护劳动力市场的美联储感到放心。【原文：US inflation probably moderated at the end of the third quarter, reassuring a Federal Reserve that’s shifting more of its policy focus toward shielding the labor market.】

item.title: 利率下降，银行纷纷拿出支票簿进行杠杆收购
item.description: 在全球利率飙升之后，投资银行被迫对高风险的并购贷款进行大幅减记，现在又重新投入到杠杆收购领域；这是金融业利润最丰厚的领域之一。【原文：Investment banks, forced to take big writedowns on risky merger and acquisitions loans after a global surge in interest rates, are now jumping back into leveraged buyouts — one of the most lucrative areas in finance.】

item.title: 意大利天然气公司同意以 53 亿欧元收购竞争对手 2i Rete Gas 公司
item.description: 意大利 Italgas SpA 公司同意收购竞争对手 2i Rete Gas 公司，这将使该公司成为欧洲最大的天然气配送网络运营商。【原文：Italy’s Italgas SpA agreed to buy rival 2i Rete Gas in a deal that would transform it into Europe’s biggest gas distribution network operator.】

item.title: 塞内加尔承诺在评级下调后迅速弥补预算缺口
item.description: 塞内加尔表示将迅速采取行动降低预算赤字，因为审计结果显示该国财政和债务状况较差，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）因此下调了这个西非国家的评级。【原文：Senegal said it will act swiftly to lower its budget deficit after an audit showing a weaker fiscal and debt position prompted Moody’s Ratings to downgrade the West African nation.】

item.title: 安莎公司称意大利就向波音承包商提供不安全部件一事调查两家公司
item.description: 据意大利安莎通讯社周六援引意大利检察官的话报道，两家意大利航空航天公司和七人因涉嫌向莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）供应不符合要求的航空零部件，用于生产波音787梦想飞机的某些部分而受到调查。【原文：Two Italian aerospace companies and seven people are being investigated for allegedly supplying non-compliant aeronautical components to Leonardo SpA for the production of some sections of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner, the Ansa newswire reported on Saturday citing Italian prosecutors.】

item.title: 市场动荡不安，沙特阿拉伯上调亚洲油价
item.description: 由于交易商关注中东冲突的发展，原油市场波动加剧，沙特阿拉伯提高了面向亚洲买家的主要石油价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia raised its main oil prices for buyers in Asia amid heightened volatility in the crude market as traders watch developments in the Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 石油 "游客 "在两年来最大涨势中涌入市场
item.description: Reza Dilmaghani 主要从事股票交易，但在过去的一周里，他受到原油近两年来最大单周涨幅的诱惑，在石油市场上进进出出。【原文：Reza Dilmaghani mostly trades equities, but for the past week he’s been dipping in and out of the oil market, lured by crude’s biggest weekly rally in nearly two years.】

item.title: 华尔街周刊让世界拥有它想要的人工智能
item.description:
对人工智能的急切追求使数据中心风靡全球

。【原文：

The rush toward AI has made data centers all the rage

】

item.title: 塞尔维亚获得更多评级提升，S&P 授予投资级评级
item.description: 塞尔维亚财政部长希望其他机构效仿 S&P 全球评级公司，授予该国投资级信用评级。【原文：Serbia’s finance minister expects other agencies to follow S&P Global Ratings in awarding the country an investment grade credit rating.】

item.title: 人工智能助力 IPhone 制造商鸿海实现收入持续反弹
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.’s revenue growth accelerated last quarter, sustaining a bounce-back as demand for the servers that drive AI development offset weak smartphone sales.】

item.title: 印度外长将自2015年以来首次访问巴基斯坦
item.description: 印度政府周五晚些时候表示，印度外交部长苏布拉哈曼亚姆-贾尚卡尔（Subrahmanyam Jaishankar）将代替总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）出席在巴基斯坦举行的由中国牵头的峰会。【原文：India’s External Affairs Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar will attend a China-led summit in Pakistan in place of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the government said late Friday.】

item.title: 世界顶级铀矿商投票决定重返核电市场
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦的选民将于周日决定是否允许建造一座核电站，因为他们担心核电站对环境的影响以及在技术上可能会依赖中亚国家的两大邻国--中国和俄罗斯。【原文：Voters in Kazakhstan will decide on Sunday whether to allow construction of a nuclear power plant amid worries over the environmental impact as well as the potential reliance on the Central Asian nation’s two giant neighbors — China and Russia — for technology.】

item.title: Vista Outdoor 将以 34 亿美元出售 Revelyst 和 Kinetic 部门
item.description: Vista Outdoor 公司在一份声明中表示，已同意以总价 33.5 亿美元的价格出售两家公司。【原文：Vista Outdoor Inc. has agreed to sell two units for a total of $3.35 billion, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 永利度假村获得阿联酋博彩运营商许可证
item.description: 永利度假村有限公司（Wynn Resorts Ltd.）表示，阿联酋商业博彩监管总局（General Commercial Gaming Regulatory Authority）已向该公司颁发了阿联酋首张商业博彩运营商执照。【原文：Wynn Resorts Ltd. said it has been awarded the first commercial gaming operator’s license in the United Arab Emirates by the country’s General Commercial Gaming Regulatory Authority.】

item.title: 印度各邦即将举行投票，莫迪直面农民的愤怒
item.description: 印度北部哈里亚纳邦周六举行地方选举，考验总理纳伦德拉-莫迪在因政府农作物价格政策而愤怒的农民中的支持率。【原文：India’s northern state of Haryana holds local elections Saturday, testing Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s support among farmers angered by the government’s policies over crop prices.】

item.title: 本-霍洛维茨支持特朗普后将向哈里斯竞选活动捐款
item.description: 风险投资家本-霍洛维茨（Ben Horowitz）和他的妻子计划向美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的总统竞选活动提供一笔 "巨额 "捐款，而这距离他们支持哈里斯的竞争对手、前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）仅过去了三个月。【原文：Venture capitalist Ben Horowitz and his wife plan to make a “significant” donation to the presidential campaign of US Vice President Kamala Harris, just three months after supporting Harris’ rival, former President Donald Trump.】
